MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY16 and SY21 postcode areas of Newtown and Welshpool, affecting properties in Adfa, Cefn Coch and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.18PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the work required to repair a broken overhead electrical cable and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.16PM on 11th March 2021.
